              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              can
               
              sew
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: That’s as much as to say “Can she so?”

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              can
               
              knit
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: What need a man care for a stock with a wench,

speaker: LANCE
text: when she can knit him a stock?

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              can
               
              wash
               
              and
               
              scour
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: A special virtue, for then she need not be

speaker: LANCE
text: washed and scoured.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              can
               
              spin
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: Then may I set the world on wheels, when she

speaker: LANCE
text: can spin for her living.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              hath
               
              many
               
              nameless
               
              virtues
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: That’s as much as to say “bastard virtues,” that

speaker: LANCE
text: indeed know not their fathers and therefore have no

speaker: LANCE
text: names.

speaker: SPEED
text: Here follow her vices.

speaker: LANCE
text: Close at the heels of her virtues.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              is
               
              not
               
              to
               
              be
               
              kissed
               
              fasting
               
              in
               
              respect
               
              of
              
              her
               
              breath
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: Well, that fault may be mended with a breakfast.

speaker: LANCE
text: Read on.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              hath
               
              a
               
              sweet
               
              mouth
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: That makes amends for her sour breath.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              doth
               
              talk
               
              in
               
              her
               
              sleep
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: It’s no matter for that, so she sleep not in her

speaker: LANCE
text: talk.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              is
               
              slow
               
              in
               
              words
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: O villain, that set this down among her vices! To

speaker: LANCE
text: be slow in words is a woman’s only virtue. I pray

speaker: LANCE
text: thee, out with ’t, and place it for her chief virtue.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              is
               
              proud
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: Out with that too; it was Eve’s legacy and

speaker: LANCE
text: cannot be ta’en from her.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              hath
               
              no
               
              teeth
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: I care not for that neither, because I love crusts.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              is
               
              curst
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: Well, the best is, she hath no teeth to bite.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              will
               
              often
               
              praise
               
              her
               
              liquor
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: If her liquor be good, she shall; if she will not, I

speaker: LANCE
text: will, for good things should be praised.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              is
               
              too
               
              liberal
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: Of her tongue she cannot, for that’s writ down

speaker: LANCE
text: she is slow of; of her purse she shall not, for that I’ll

speaker: LANCE
text: keep shut; now, of another thing she may, and that

speaker: LANCE
text: cannot I help. Well, proceed.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              hath
               
              more
               
              hair
               
              than
               
              wit
              ,
               
              and
               
              more
              
              faults
               
              than
               
              hairs
              ,
               
              and
               
              more
               
              wealth
               
              than
               
              faults
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: Stop there. I’ll have her. She was mine and not

speaker: LANCE
text: mine twice or thrice in that last article. Rehearse

speaker: LANCE
text: that once more.

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              Item
              ,
               
              She
               
              hath
               
              more
               
              hair
               
              than
               
              wit
              .

speaker: LANCE
text:
“
                More
                 
                hair
                 
                than
                 
                wit
                ”
              ? It may be; I’ll prove it:

speaker: LANCE
text: the cover of the salt hides the salt, and therefore it is

speaker: LANCE
text: more than the salt; the hair that covers the wit is

speaker: LANCE
text: more than the wit, for the greater hides the less.

speaker: LANCE
text: What’s next?

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              And
               
              more
               
              faults
               
              than
               
              hairs
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: That’s monstrous! O, that that were out!

speaker: SPEED
text:
SPEED
            
            
              
              And
               
              more
               
              wealth
               
              than
               
              faults
              .

speaker: LANCE
text: Why, that word makes the faults gracious. Well,

speaker: LANCE
text: I’ll have her, and if it be a match, as nothing is

speaker: LANCE
text: impossible—

speaker: SPEED
text: What then?

speaker: LANCE
text: Why, then will I tell thee that thy master stays

speaker: LANCE
text: for thee at the North Gate.

speaker: SPEED
text: For me?

speaker: LANCE
text: For thee? Ay, who art thou? He hath stayed for a

speaker: LANCE
text: better man than thee.

speaker: SPEED
text: And must I go to him?

speaker: LANCE
text: Thou must run to him, for thou hast stayed so

speaker: LANCE
text: long that going will scarce serve the turn.

speaker: SPEED
text: Why didst not tell me

speaker: SPEED
text: sooner? Pox of your love letters!

speaker: LANCE
text: Now will he be swinged for reading my letter;

speaker: LANCE
text: an unmannerly slave, that will thrust himself into

speaker: LANCE
text: secrets. I’ll after, to rejoice in the boy’s correction.
